mapper.update: update sys_users set username = #{username},password = #{password},salt = #{salt},locked = #{locked} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id id,username username, password password,salt salt,locked locked from sys_users where username = #{username}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_users_roles where user_id = #{uid} and role_id = #{rid}
mapper.select: select r.role from sys_users_roles as ur left join sys_roles as r on r.id = ur.role_id left join sys_users as u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.username = #{username}
